channel.title: Bread on CSx
channel.description: Recent content in Bread on CSx

item.title: Pulla Bread
item.description: Great British Chefs Original write up by Trine Hahnemann found here Makes 2 loafs 2 hours 30 minutes Ingredients 50g of fresh yeast, (or 19g of dried yeast) But fresh yeast is preferable 250ml of whole milk, lukewarm 100g of salted butter, softened, cut into small pieces 2 eggs, lightly beaten 700g of plain flour, sifted, plus extra to dust 100g of golden caster sugar 1/2 tsp salt 1 tbsp of cardamom seeds, crushed
